short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create TagUI automation flows by recording your actions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension records your actions in chrome and generates a TagUI script for RPA automation. For more information on TagUI, check out https://github.com/kelaberetiv/TagUI
